CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS silver;

-- ============================================
-- 1. Załaduj dane z warstwy Bronze jako tymczasowy widok
-- ============================================
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW bronze_forecast
USING parquet
OPTIONS (
  path 'abfss://bronze@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/Erp/forecast_details'
);

-- ============================================
-- 2. Agregacja najnowszych danych na poziomie miesiąca
-- ============================================
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW aggregated_forecast AS
SELECT 
    product_id,
    country_id,
    max(update_date) as forecast_update_date,
    TRUNC(forecast_date, "MM") AS forecast_date,
    TRUNC(forecast_snapshot, "MM") AS forecast_snapshot,
    
    SUM(quantity) AS quantity,
    SUM(whrs_sell_in_quantity) AS whrs_sell_in_quantity,
    SUM(whrs_open_quantity) AS whrs_open_quantity,
    SUM(whrs_end_quantity) AS whrs_end_quantity,
    
    SUM(pos_sell_out_quantity) AS pos_sell_out_quantity,
    SUM(pos_open_quantity) AS pos_open_quantity,
    SUM(pos_end_quantity) AS pos_end_quantity,
    
    ROUND(SUM(quantity * unit_price), 2) AS amount,
    ROUND(SUM(whrs_sell_in_quantity * unit_price), 2) AS whrs_sell_in_amount,
    ROUND(SUM(whrs_open_quantity * unit_price), 2) AS whrs_open_amount,
    ROUND(SUM(whrs_end_quantity * unit_price), 2) AS whrs_end_amount,
    
    ROUND(SUM(pos_sell_out_quantity * unit_price), 2) AS pos_sell_out_amount,
    ROUND(SUM(pos_open_quantity * unit_price), 2) AS pos_open_amount,
    ROUND(SUM(pos_end_quantity * unit_price), 2) AS pos_end_amount,
    
    ROUND(SUM(quantity * unit_price) / NULLIF(SUM(quantity), 0), 2) AS unit_price
FROM  bronze_forecast
GROUP BY product_id, country_id, TRUNC(forecast_date, "MM"), TRUNC(forecast_snapshot, "MM");

-- ============================================
-- 3. Stwórz tabelę Silver, jeśli nie istnieje
-- ============================================
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS silver.f_forecast
USING delta
LOCATION 'abfss://silver@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/f_forecast'
AS
SELECT * FROM aggregated_forecast
WHERE 1 = 0;


CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW filter_d_products AS
SELECT *from new_d_products n 
where  NOT EXISTS (select product_id From silver.f_forecast s 
                    where s.product_id =n.product_id 
                      and s.country_id = n.country_id
                      and s.forecast_update_date = n.forecast_update_date
                      and s.forecast_date = n.forecast_date
                      and s.forecast_snapshot= n.forecast_snapshot
                   )

-- ============================================
-- 4. Wykonaj MERGE INTO, aby zaktualizować lub dodać nowe dane
-- ============================================
MERGE INTO silver.f_forecast AS target
USING aggregated_forecast AS source
ON target.product_id = source.product_id
   AND target.country_id = source.country_id
   AND target.forecast_date = source.forecast_date
   AND target.forecast_snapshot = source.forecast_snapshot

WHEN MATCHED THEN
  UPDATE SET
    target.quantity = source.quantity,
    target.whrs_sell_in_quantity = source.whrs_sell_in_quantity,
    target.whrs_open_quantity = source.whrs_open_quantity,
    target.whrs_end_quantity = source.whrs_end_quantity,
    
    target.pos_sell_out_quantity = source.pos_sell_out_quantity,
    target.pos_open_quantity = source.pos_open_quantity,
    target.pos_end_quantity = source.pos_end_quantity,
    
    target.amount = source.amount,
    target.whrs_sell_in_amount = source.whrs_sell_in_amount,
    target.whrs_open_amount = source.whrs_open_amount,
    target.whrs_end_amount = source.whrs_end_amount,
    
    target.pos_sell_out_amount = source.pos_sell_out_amount,
    target.pos_open_amount = source.pos_open_amount,
    target.pos_end_amount = source.pos_end_amount,
    
    target.unit_price = source.unit_price,
    target.forecast_update_date = source.forecast_update_date

WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
  INSERT (
    product_id, country_id, forecast_date, forecast_snapshot,
    quantity, whrs_sell_in_quantity, whrs_open_quantity, whrs_end_quantity,
    pos_sell_out_quantity, pos_open_quantity, pos_end_quantity,
    amount, whrs_sell_in_amount, whrs_open_amount, whrs_end_amount,
    pos_sell_out_amount, pos_open_amount, pos_end_amount, unit_price,forecast_update_date
  )
  VALUES (
    source.product_id, source.country_id, source.forecast_date, source.forecast_snapshot,
    source.quantity, source.whrs_sell_in_quantity, source.whrs_open_quantity, source.whrs_end_quantity,
    source.pos_sell_out_quantity, source.pos_open_quantity, source.pos_end_quantity,
    source.amount, source.whrs_sell_in_amount, source.whrs_open_amount, source.whrs_end_amount,
    source.pos_sell_out_amount, source.pos_open_amount, source.pos_end_amount, source.unit_price,source.forecast_update_date
  );
